title: Is the gemstone conversion to the Masterwork chest currently live and does it come with a key?
body: [Here on the 8.10 Patch notes it says instead of converting to a normal hextech chest and key, it not converts to a Masterwork chest](https://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-810-notes/). When I just tried to do this on 8.10, it still shows up as a normal hextech chest instead of a Masterwork one. Can any Rioter comment about whether the gemstone will be turned into the Masterwork chest regardless? And does it come with a key as well?

replies.body:
I traded in 5 of my gemstones.

All 5 gave me regular looking chests however they all gave me non-champion shards. 1 emote and 4 skins.

I don't know if I was just lucky or if its simply a visual bug and they are in fact Masterwork chests.

Yes they had keys.
As far as I know the masterwork change only came in this patch (yesterday) so I wouldn't be surprised if it's a visual bug in your case, but it wasn't yet a thing in the OPs.
